resources.string: I am willing to die for Super Earth and am ready to perish in the pursuit of spreading managed democracy to the galaxy
Current orders for Helldivers, join now and support fellow Helldivers in this mission!
TODO lorem ipsum lorem ipsum lorem ipsum
Enlist now to become a Helldiver and join in this honorable mission!
Hunters are small terminid units that often travel in large packs with another, or in groups with other units. They are prone to jump from side to side before quickly striking, beware the claws!
Bile Spewers are large, venomous terminid units that usually travel alone. They spew bile from their large bellies that is quite toxic.
Bile Titans are enormous rare terminid units that few helldivers ever get to see! Like the Bile Spewers they spew out toxic bile at perceived threats.
The Commissar automatons come equipped with either swords or blasters, they\'re the bread and butter of the automaton forces.
Dropships come to the aid of automaton forces if requested via a flare, they will drop additional automaton units, more units to bring democracy to!
Strider units have a regular footsoldier at the helm, simply eliminate the strider and only the regular unit will remain.
